item.title: Squeezing 1-2% Efficiency Gains Out of Muon by Optimizing the Newton-Schulz Coefficients
item.description: Simply switching to Muon can already get you 2x efficiency gains. But you can squeeze out an extra 1-2% by optimizing the Newton-Schulz coefficients.
